description:
The Khan Academy is an organization on a mission. We're a not-for-profit with the goal of changing education for the better by providing a free world-class education to anyone, anywhere.

All of the site's resources are available to anyone. It doesn't matter if you are a student, teacher, home-schooler, principal, adult returning to the classroom after 20 years, or a friendly alien just trying to get a leg up in earthly biology. The Khan Academy's materials and resources are available to you completely free of charge.

Our library of more than 2,700 videos covers K-12 math, science topics such as biology, chemistry and physics, and even reaches into the humanities with playlists on finance and history. Each video is a digestible chunk, approximately 10 minutes long, and the app is specifically designed for viewing on HP TouchPad.
versionNote:
New features include:
- Account Login using Google and Facebook
- Bookmark
- Badges
- Account History
- Video History
- Enhancement to user interface
